name: CUSTOM Collection #5
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign icon = section.settings.icon
  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_align = section.settings.icon_align
  assign icon_align_mobile = section.settings.icon_align_mobile
  assign hide_icon = section.settings.hide_icon
  assign icon_color = section.settings.icon_color

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile
  assign heading_mt = section.settings.heading_mt

  assign text = section.settings.text
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align
  assign text_align_mobile = section.settings.text_align_mobile
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_width = section.settings.text_width

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt

  assign autoplay_delay = section.settings.autoplay_delay
  assign autoplay = section.settings.autoplay

  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  assign card_shadow = section.settings.card_shadow
  assign card_shadow_color = section.settings.card_shadow_color
  assign card_overlay = section.settings.card_overlay
  assign card_overlay_color = section.settings.card_overlay_color
  assign card_ratio = section.settings.card_ratio
  assign card_ratio_mobile = section.settings.card_ratio_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_position_mobile = section.settings.content_horizontal_position_mobile
  assign content_horizontal_position = section.settings.content_horizontal_position
  assign content_vertical_position_mobile = section.settings.content_vertical_position_mobile
  assign content_vertical_position = section.settings.content_vertical_position

  assign sub_heading_size = section.settings.sub_heading_size
  assign sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign sub_heading_color = section.settings.sub_heading_color
  assign sub_heading_custom = section.settings.sub_heading_custom
  assign sub_heading_font = section.settings.sub_heading_font
  assign sub_heading_height = section.settings.sub_heading_height

  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt

  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_position_mobile_text = ""

  if content_horizontal_position_mobile == "start"
    assign content_horizontal_position_mobile_text = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_position_mobile == "end"
    assign content_horizontal_position_mobile_text = "right"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_position_mobile_text = "center"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_position_text = ""

  if content_horizontal_position == "start"
    assign content_horizontal_position_text = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_position == "end"
    assign content_horizontal_position_text = "right"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_position_text = "center"
  endif
  
  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy 
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy' 
  endif 
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} img,
  .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ icon_color }};
  }

  .collections-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .collections-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .collections-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .collections-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .collections-body-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .collections-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .collections-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    height: unset !important;
    position: relative;
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_position_mobile }};
    justify-content: {{ content_vertical_position_mobile }};
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .collections-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .collections-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .collections-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .collections-image-{{ section.id }}:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    background-color: {{ card_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: card_overlay }};
  }

  .collections-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    margin: 0px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ sub_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ content_horizontal_position_mobile_text }};
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .collections-title-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ content_horizontal_position_mobile_text }};
    text-transform: unset;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .collections-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .collections-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15);
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px !important;
  }

  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px !important;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
    margin-left: 2px;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: -2px;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover ,
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .collections-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .collections-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .collections-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
    }

    .collections-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
      width: 100%;
      max-width: {{ text_width }}%;
    }

    .collections-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .collections-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_position }};
      justify-content: {{ content_vertical_position }};
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .collections-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{  sub_heading_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_horizontal_position_text }};
    }

    .collections-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_horizontal_position_text }};
    }

    .collections-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      left: -{{ arrow_size | times: 0.5 }}px !important;
      transform: translate({{ arrow_size | times: 0.25 | round: 0 }}px,-50%);
    }
  
    .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      right: -{{ arrow_size | times: 0.5 }}px !important;
      transform: translate(-{{ arrow_size | times: 0.25 | round: 0 }}px,-50%);
    }

    .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .collections-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .collections-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .collections-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .collections-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .collections-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if card_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if icon_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
   .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% elsif icon_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
   .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if icon_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif icon_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-text-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif text_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-text-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .collections-text-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_shadow %}
  <style>
    .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px {{ card_shadow_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.4 }};
    }
    
    .collections-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 10px !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .collections-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
    gap: {{ slider_gap }}px;
  }

  .collections-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .collections-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collections-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .collections-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collections-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(25% - {{ slider_gap | times: 0.5 }}px);
    }
  }
</style>

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} collections-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% unless hide_icon  %}
        <div class="collections-icon-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if icon != blank %}
           {{ icon | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                loading: loading_attribute,
                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                alt: icon.alt | escape
              }}
          {% else %}
            <svg stroke-width="1" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16"><path fill="currentColor" d="M8.86 4.38a2.78 2.78 0 013.72-.3c1.4 1.2 1.2 3.11.19 4.13L7.98 13.1c-.05.06-.1.06-.19 0L3.01 8.2a2.8 2.8 0 01.19-4.1c1.06-.9 2.7-.76 3.74.28l.96.98.96-.98zm-.96-.45l.24-.25a3.78 3.78 0 015.07-.38l.01.01v.01a3.82 3.82 0 01.26 5.59l-4.79 4.9a1.12 1.12 0 01-1.45.12l-.1-.06L2.3 8.91a3.8 3.8 0 01.26-5.57 3.79 3.79 0 015.1.33l.01.01.24.25z" fill-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
      {% endunless %}

      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="collections-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      {% if text != blank %}
        <div class="collections-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ text }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      {% if section.blocks.size > 0 %}
        <div class="collections-body-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="collections-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper preview">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for item in (1..3) %}
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  <a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" class="collections-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
    
                    <div class="collections-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                        {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                            loading: loading_attribute,
                            sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                            widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                            alt: block.settings.image.alt | escape
                          }}
                      {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                        {{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                            loading: loading_attribute,
                            sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                            widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                            alt: block.settings.collection.featured_image.alt | escape
                          }}
                      {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                    
                    {% if block.settings.sub_heading != blank %}
                      <p class="collections-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sub_heading }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
  
                    {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                      <p class="collections-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</p>
                    {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                      <p class="collections-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.collection.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.button != blank %}
                      <div href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" class="collections-button-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.button }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  </a>
                {% endfor %}
              {% endfor %}
            </div>           
          </div>
          <div class="collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
          </div>
          <div class="collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
          </div>  
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@9/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initCollections5() {
    document.querySelector('.collections-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper('.collections-slider-{{ section.id }}', {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.collections-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.collections-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }}
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }}
        }
      },
      {% if autoplay %}
      loop: true,
      autoplay: {
        delay: {{ autoplay_delay }}000,
        disableOnInteraction: false,
        autoplayDisableOnInteraction: false
      }
      {% endif %}
    })
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initCollections5);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initCollections5);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initCollections5);
  }
  
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
